Home Projects Resume

3D Door and Robot Arm Animation

Project Overview

This project is my final project for the '3D Animation for Games' course in the 2nd year of the Digital Game Design Department at İstinye University. A mine cart passes through a relatively complex gate, and a robotic arm picks up the carried basket and places it next to the other baskets. It was completed on January 15, 2025.

Skills Used

3D Modelling 3D Animation Maya

Complex Door

This is a door with a four-lock mechanism.
